[ti:p u n c h i n ‘ . t h e . c l o c k (Explicit)]
[ar:J. Cole]
[al:The Off-Season (Explicit)]

[00:00.00]p u n c h i n ‘ . t h e . c l o c k (Explicit) - J. Cole
[00:00.93]Lyrics by：J. Cole
[00:01.86]Composed by：J. Cole
[00:02.80]J. Cole/Damian Lillard：
[00:03.16]It ain't nothing I want more
[00:03.98]
[00:05.73]Ain't nothing I want more
[00:06.41]
[00:08.27]I ain't c
[00:08.60]I told you when I first came here
[00:09.53]I said "I ain't come here to waste my time"
[00:10.88]
[00:11.65]I came here
[00:12.96]They gave us a chance to get in like we asked for
[00:14.52]
[00:15.09]And that's that's what we here to do
[00:16.44]Yeah n***a 26
[00:16.94]
[00:17.79]The job still ain't done
[00:18.37]Straight up
[00:18.53]But I I said "You you know what I'm here for"
[00:20.40]J. Cole：
[00:20.64]Back on top punchin' the clock clutchin' sanity
[00:22.98]I got more cribs than Habitat for Humanity
[00:25.55]S**t profound we propagating more profanity
[00:28.01]Paid off collections from recollections of calamity
[00:29.72]Oh s**t look that n***a gonna shoot
[00:30.60]The s**t pop off I learned to duck under the canopy
[00:32.34]Oh s**t run n***a run
[00:33.17]'Til it cool off they murked a n***a right in front of me
[00:35.89]Told him to come off his chain for tryna floss
[00:38.26]Died over a cross just like the start of Christianity
[00:40.76]When I was a boy the teacher often reprimanded me
[00:43.13]Jermaine
[00:43.61]Thought it was toys it was a Glock this n***a handed me
[00:45.96]I busted the trees was barely strong enough to squeeze
[00:48.33]Bullets traveled through leaves it probably killed somebody randomly
[00:51.17]Ran in the crib and played it off amongst the family
[00:53.68]Nightmare scenes the police finally apprehended me
[00:56.04]Woke up screamin' seen a demon had his hand on me
[00:58.85]Still sport the scar on my arm from where he branded me
[01:01.38]Like a Que Dog my n***as burnin' with the mute off
[01:03.90]Loud pack smoke through the cracks I catch a contact
[01:06.50]Triggerin' a paranoid mindset now I'm back
[01:09.02]Teeterin' between enlightened and insanity
[01:11.50]Now that I'm rich I feel nobody understandin' me
[01:13.98]All I can do is cut the mic on holler at you
[01:16.65]Can't let the fame scare me off from speaking candidly
[01:19.23]All them n***as is so Kane they started singin' like Danity
[01:22.05]Now I'm left here paid like I planned to be d**n
[01:24.42]Damian Lillard：
[01:26.81]A lot of times those situations are um are handled way before the time comes
[01:32.60]In the summer I think when you truly prepare yourself and
[01:36.00]With training and conditioning and things like that
[01:39.09]When you cheat yourself you fail in those moments
[01:41.65]You know you crash and when you really put the time in and
[01:45.05]
[01:45.56]Whether people see it or whether people know it or not
[01:48.25]You know it always come to light
data.trans:
[ti:p u n c h i n ‘ . t h e . c l o c k (Explicit)]
[ar:J. Cole]
[al:The Off-Season (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.93]//
[00:01.86]//
[00:02.80]//
[00:03.16]我别无所求
[00:03.98]
[00:05.73]别无所求
[00:06.41]
[00:08.27]我并非
[00:08.60]就像我初来乍到时告诉你的那样
[00:09.53]我说过 我不是来这里虚度光阴的
[00:10.88]
[00:11.65]我来到这里
[00:12.96]他们给了我们冲进季后赛的机会 正如我们要求的那样
[00:14.52]
[00:15.09]这就是我们此行的目的
[00:16.44]哥们 拿下26分
[00:16.94]
[00:17.79]任重道远
[00:18.37]实话实说
[00:18.53]但是我说过 你知道我此行的目的 
[00:20.40]//
[00:20.64]回到巅峰 按下时钟 保持清醒
[00:22.98]我的豪宅比仁人家园的房子还多
[00:25.55]影响深远 我们传播着亵渎的思想
[00:28.01]不幸的回忆让我赚到盆满钵满
[00:29.72]该死 听着 那个家伙要开枪了
[00:30.60]子弹横飞 我学会了躲在掩体下面
[00:32.34]该死 赶紧跑 哥们 赶紧跑
[00:33.17]直到一切平静下来 他们在我面前干掉一个哥们
[00:35.89]告诉他摘下项链 别四处炫耀
[00:38.26]为了一个十字架而死 就像是基督教的起源一样
[00:40.76]当我还是个孩子时 老师经常训斥我
[00:43.13]//
[00:43.61]以为这只是玩具 但是这个家伙递给我一把格洛克枪
[00:45.96]我朝着树林开枪 但是我勉强能够握住手里的枪
[00:48.33]子弹穿过树叶 可能会意外打伤无辜的人
[00:51.17]在家里奔跑 手枪在家人之间传递玩弄
[00:53.68]噩梦般的场景 警察最终逮捕了我
[00:56.04]尖叫着醒来 仿佛看见恶魔紧紧抓着我
[00:58.85]他在我胳膊上留下的疤痕依然清晰可见
[01:01.38]就像Que Dog的纹身 我的兄弟尽情地吞云吐雾
[01:03.90]烟雾从缝隙里飘散出来 我飘飘欲仙
[01:06.50]触发了我偏执的心理 现在我清醒过来
[01:09.02]在清醒和疯狂之间摇摆不定
[01:11.50]现在我腰缠万贯 可我觉得没有人理解我
[01:13.98]我能够做的就是打开麦克风 冲着你呐喊
[01:16.65]不能任由名声把我吓跑 不敢吐露真言
[01:19.23]这些哥们卑鄙无耻 他们暗中告密 就像Danity Kane组合引吭高歌一样
[01:22.05]现在我留在这里 就像我计划的那般赚钱
[01:24.42]//
[01:26.81]大多数时候 这些情况在时机到来之前已经妥善处理
[01:32.60]在夏天的时候 我想在你真正做好准备的时候
[01:36.00]刻苦训练 提升自己的实力
[01:39.09]当你自欺欺人时 这些时候你一败涂地
[01:41.65]你知道你变得一团糟 当你真正投入时间时
[01:45.05]
[01:45.56]无论人们是否看见 无论人们知道与否
[01:48.25]你知道一切都会真相大白
